ex2

Class MainServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • ex2.MyServlet
          • ex2.MainServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(name="MainServlet",
            urlPatterns="/MainServlet")
public class MainServlet
extends MyServlet
    The MainServlet displays the main page and acts as a dispatcher for search and add servlets
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void doGet(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Handles the HTTP GET method.
      redirects to LoginServlet if not logged in
      dispatches to SearchServlet if searchName is defined
      printMain otherwise
      protected void doPost(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Handles the HTTP POST method.
      redirects to LoginServlet if not logged in
      dispatches to AddServlet if addName is defined
      printMain otherwise

      Returns a short description of the servlet.
